name: Boole Sim
description:
A prototype that lets you play around with logic gates.

Controls:

  • Left click to select a Gate, or hold to move it.
  • Right click and drag to connect a Gate's output to another Gate's input.
  • Delete removes the current selected gate.
  • Escape to deselect a Gate.
  • The arrow keys move the board.

I'm always up for suggestions on how to improve/make this an actual game.
